content.en: Structural health monitoring: Researchers are exploring the use of wireless sensor networks and algorithms to monitor the health of structures. They are investigating how localized information processing, distributed algorithms, and intelligent sensor networks can accurately detect and localize structural damage. These algorithms, such as the Embedded AR-ARX method and artificial intelligence routing, are being designed to improve the efficiency and dependability of structural health monitoring.
content.da: Strukturel sundhedsovervågning: Forskere undersøger brugen af trådløse sensornetværk og algoritmer til at overvåge strukturers sundhed. De undersøger, hvordan lokaliseret informationsbehandling, distribuerede algoritmer og intelligente sensornetværk præcist kan opdage og lokalisere strukturel skade. Disse algoritmer, som den indlejrede AR-ARX-metode og kunstig intelligens-routing, designes til at forbedre effektiviteten og pålideligheden af strukturel sundhedsovervågning.
